Key Match Events: Lane Thomas had four RBI and the Cleveland Guardians held on behind their bullpen to beat the Chicago White Sox 6-4.
Austin Hedges homered to left (362 feet) in the 3rd inning.
Thomas reached on infield single to third, Kwan scored and Ramírez scored in the 1st inning.
Thomas reached on infield single to second, Kwan scored and Giménez scored in the 3rd inning.
Sosa singled to center, Julks scored, Ramos to second, Robert Jr. to third in the 3rd inning.
Robert Jr. scored on a balk, Sosa to second on a balk, Ramos to third on a balk in the 3rd inning.
Vargas grounded out to second, Ramos scored, Sosa to third in the 3rd inning.
Fletcher reached on infield single to shortstop, Sosa scored in the 3rd inning.
Brennan grounded out to first, Thomas scored, Freeman to second in the 8th inning.
